transcript:
Customer: Main bhi kya hota hai koi nahi gaya baith jaiye.
Customer: Uske main kya karu payment ka kaun karwa gaya.
Customer: Payment karwa ke jaiye.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan. Hello.
Executive: Haan what is good evening good evening Himanshu baat kar raha hu sir India Mart se business manager.
Customer: Boliye Sneha ji se discussion hui thi ji Sneha ji se discussion hui thi TrustSeal unhone bataya wo explain kiya hoga. Ji.
Customer: Haan sir. Apne.
Customer: Apne 5:30 mein bola tha call karne ke liye.
Customer: Haan main bola tha lekin mera kya wo bade bhai se bhi discussion abhi raat ko hoga.
Executive: Achcha raat ko hoga. Haan wo dekh lijiyega.
Executive: Dekh lijiyega sir ek chota amount hai jo apne invest to kiya hi achcha khasa aur usko add on karne mein sari service aapki double ho jayegi aur listing mein bhi kahin na kahin help out hoga top pe aa jayegi to wo benefit hoga conversion mein aur kahin na kahin wo aapko jo Makrana mein itne sare log hai at least unke sath aap dikhoge jo abhi niche dikh raha hai. Theek hai. Theek hai.
Customer: Kitne baje batayenge aap?
Customer: Main kal subah 10:00 11:00 baje.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to discuss TrustSeal with his brother.



Resolution:

- Executive explained benefits of TrustSeal subscription.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will confirm by tomorrow 10-11 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, subscription, payment, discussion
